item.title: Insertion Sort
Introduction
item.description: Designing and Analyzing Algorithms Chapter 1 Overview of Algorithms and their place in modern computing systems Chapter 2 First algorithms - Sorting a sequence of n numbers Determining runtimes of algorithms Chapter 3 Defines asymptotic notation Mathamatic notation Chapter 4 Divide and Conquer Strassens method for multipling matrices master method Chapter 5 Probablistic analysis - Used to determine run time of algorithm with probability distribution Randomized algorithms - Enforce a probability distribution on inputs
